comments.author: Jegan
comments.content: @Pradep: Dei dei dei naye.... unaku konjamaavadhu manasaatchi iruka da ? No.1 vetti thanathula ennoda status msg a pottutiye?? Jorge Luis quote da adhu... sela ponnunga "Hurray!" , " :( " , "na nana naa na" ipdi laam status vacha, udane poi "wat happend?" , "dont worry, we will meet up sometime" , "i am always thinking abt u" apdilaam comment adikireenga... oru meaningful status vacha maanatha vaangureenga... enna koduma sarvanan idhu?!?!
